entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DLLs created by Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator are built in debug mode #77136
  • System.MulticastDelegate constructors should be [DebuggerStepThrough] #77131
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions mono regressions #77129
  • Many Gen1 GCs doing nothing with high fragmentation #77128
  • [HttpStress] massive timeouts around HTTP/3 stress test startup #77126
  • [Wasm][Profiled AOT] Error: TaskT_TransitionToFinal_AlreadyCompleted #77122
  • Backlog Clearing Strategy for System.Buffers, System.Numerics, System.Numerics.Tensors, System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77119
    8.0.0
  • Source Genereate Error not provided by TypeInfoResolver of type 'MyJsonContext'. If using source generation, ensure that all root types passed to the serializer have been indicated with 'JsonSerializableAttribute', along with any types that might be serialized polymorphically. #77115
  • Launching a dotnet process with real time causes all the runtime threads to have same priority #77108

Closed

  • System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache In ASP.NET WEB API - Error Instantiating #77101
  • Grpc.Net.Common .NETStandard is missing "Grpc.Net.Compression.DeflateCompressionProvider" #75086
    Future
  • [ProfilerAPI] No more ModuleLoadFinished callbacks for dynamic modules #76016
    8.0.0
  • Assembly.CodeBase does not produce a correctly escaped URI #38224
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add ICloneable<T> #77121
  • [API Proposal]: Parity between Date-/TimeOnly And DateTime(Offset) #77114
    Future
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Options #43919
    Future
  • SignatureTypeEncoder missing API for encoding custom modifiers on void* #19710
    Future
  • [SRM] Mark assembly as [CLSCompliant(true)] and mark individual APIs as [CLSCompliant(false)] #16355
    Future
  • End of life support of 'System.ComponentModel.Annotations | 5.0.0' package #77109
  • Need help identifying types which need Custom Converter to be implemented when using System.Text.Json #76914
  • Query on Migrating from Newtonsoft to System.Text.Json #77040
  • [v7.0.0-rc.1.22426.10] Extremely slow build of non-portable runtime on `armv7` #75811

PullRequests

Created

  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CVE-2022-37434: Update zlib-intel to the latest version #77135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update README.md's to use "contribution bar" #77134
    documentation, area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add [DebuggerStepThrough] to MulticastDelegate constructors. #77132
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Logging API doc additions #77127
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/7.0] HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #77125
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Do not allow move and shifting with MSL on 16-bit vectors #77123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77118
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix loading app-local ICU #77117
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • Make sure that CoreLib ref and src build matches #77116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][tests] Update instantiate_info to use mono_class_interface_offset_with_variance for interface offset #77113
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete some unused files and functions from clr pal #77112
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update area-System.IO.Pipelines lead #77111
    area-Meta
  • Update Unix dependencies installation script #77107
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] fix debug assert on large number of virtual methods #77106
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Emit ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished for dynamic modules #77068
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Typo #77104
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • NativeAOT: remove some headers that are not needed #77042
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ILLink running in incremental builds #77110
    area-Infrastructure, linkable-framework
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [Release 6.0] Update zlib-libraries to resolve CVE-2022-37434 #77138
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • More timeout checks in RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #74531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MONO] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fold 'static readonly struct' to constants #77102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #76942
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add IR support for modeling multiple SSA definitions as one store #76139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Vectorize (Last)IndexOfAny(Except) for ASCII needles #76740
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.Reverse() for Vector128 #76076
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • JIT: avoid LCL_FLD stress for locals that already have LCL_FLD appear… #77082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Green Threads] GC tracking in suspended threads is not enabled. If a GC occurs, there will be heap corruption #2011
  • NativeAOT "Type" is not a supported Runtime Directive IN RD.xml #2031

PullRequests

Updated

  • Green thread objects #2023
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Turn on optimisation in RyuJit module, partial support for FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publish fails with locked file with web.config and hardlinks #28616

Closed

  • MSB4242: SDK Resolver Failure due to System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException #28488
  • dotnet new should have a --force-english-output switch #28287
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug
  • Return workload manifests in defined, controllable order #28627
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2023324 #28626
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Run less tests per Helix Proc to Increase Pipeline Performance #28623
    Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28619
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2022930 #28597
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28595
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-new] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #28295
    Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    Area-Workloads
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates
  • Ensure case-insensitive web.config file name is used #14854
    Area-WebSDK, 7.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow types to differ in terms of nullability #6556
  • Add C# 11 to language history #6546
  • Require types to match between pattern variable redeclarations #6555
  • Flow `scoped` in anonymous function conversion #6551

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rename code action offered when nothing to rename #64785
  • Out argument val escape should not contribute to invocation escape analysis #64783
  • `[UnscopedRef]` ignored on `ref` parameter from metadata of `ref struct` type #64778
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by `[UnscopedRef]` and defensively copied struct. #64776
  • InvalidProgramException when attempting to instantiate generic type via implicit operator (and generic parameter is nullable value tuple) #64777
    17.5
  • Building crash using newer .NET SDK than 6.0.203 #64774
  • Analyzer performance for disabled by default rules #64771
    17.5 P1

Closed

  • Untyped lambda parameters should infer `scoped` from target delegate #62080
    17.5
  • New `prop` semantic snippet doesn't place cursor where expected #64731
    17.5
  • Where are the docs for writing source analyzers outside VS (for cross-platform CLI)? #64769
  • Ensure Local Constant Usage is Tracked in Local function and Lambda Parameter Attributes #63911
    C# 12.0
  • Empty parameter name reported in error "missing required parameter" #64436
    17.5
  • Compilation error when using generics and static abstract members together #64763

PullRequests

Created

  • Trigger background analyzer load when document open #64786
    Area-IDE
  • Out arguments do not contribute val escape #64784
    Area-Compilers
  • Add snippets back to dev17.4 #64782
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Fix MSBuild tests and run them in CI again #64781
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge spell checking fix into 17.4 release #64779
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForQB
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Small analyzer performance fix for disabled by default rules #64772
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in NavigateTo OOP calls. #64576
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters #64680
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64780
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Refactor LSP server exit / shutdown / dispose logic for resiliency and clarity #64752
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Move the SymbolTree index cache off of the incremental-analyzer subsystem #64760
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify SymbolTreeInfo creation #64775
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fixed prop snippet caret position #64732
    Area-IDE, Community, OnDeckForServicing, Next
  • Do not realize member-symbols when producing the symbol-tree index. #64767
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Track local constant usage in attributes #64660
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64750
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #64759
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Name anonymous delegate parameters #64604
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next

Updated

  • Do not treat `Nullable` null value as a constant for the purpose of IL generation. #64789
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64788
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use IAsyncEnumerable in DesignerAttributeScanning as well. #64616
    Area-IDE
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
  • Additional tests for ref fields #64707
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Allow reordering parameters, inserting, and deleting parameters #64596
    Area-IDE
  • Read required project properties from evaluation data #64749
    Area-IDE
  • VB: Align design around speculative semantic models with C#. #64751
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nullable walker cycle #64600
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify error message when attempting to ref a property #64764
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enhance rule metadata and suppression info in SARIF V2 errorlog #64277
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Encoding serialization #64625
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #64758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine SignalR functional test "closed with error or start fails if hub cannot be created" #44608
  • Replace outdated dependencies in Blazor Server project template #44606
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Consider searching for ROS<char> variants of TryParse in RDF #44603
  • Document migration process for SPA projects #44600
    8.0-MQ
  • Add a way to customize WebApplicationBuilder before Build is called #44599
  • Contribute an existing Sample related to invoking an external AuthZ service for further permissions check. #44598
  • [Templates] Update icons in our templates #44596
  • Add support for storing Encryption keys in Cosmos Db #44590
    Discussions
  • Why the constructor access level of "Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost.ClientHandler" is "internal"? #44589
  • Blazor in WebComponent #44588
  • Blazor WASM not load LocalStorage or IndexedDB from IFrame #44587
  • JSInitializer.importInitializersAsync doesn't respect initializerArguments #44586

Closed

  • Flakiness in SignalR NPM functional tests #44607
  • ASP.NET Identity Core 2.2 - Suppress "There are no external services ..." #12303
    Backlog
  • .net 6 rc2 identity login page return 500 #38132
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, updates #44563
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44585
  • CertificateFailedValidation event is not logging the ChainErrors as expected. #44484
    8.0-preview1
  • FallbackPolicy takes precedence over AuthorizeFilters added using Conventions #39930
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Flag for templates which uses an existing shared framework build #11814
    8.0-MQ
  • Blazor WASM with custom user roles on Azure B2C #29000
    8.0-MQ
  • Standardize a User/Role/Policy Manager in the Razor Page, MVC, Blazor Templates. #44584
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #44577
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #44580
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #44581

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine SignalR functional test "closed with error or start fails if hub cannot be created" #44609
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
  • [release/6.0] Get rid of IsPublicRuntime, use AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed #44605
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Add AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed for helix #44604
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Skip test that times out in CI #44602
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44597
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/7.0] add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536 #44583
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix documentation for .AddIdentityResources() #44560
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix logging of certificate chain errors. #44503
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9fbb657` to `a9b2f04` #44593
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add comment about mixing FallbackPolicy with AuthorizeFilter #44505
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Use Path.GetTempFileName() for 600 Unix file mode #44477
    8.0-preview1
  • add ppc64le arch to crossgen2 not available list #44536
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Uri StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44570
    community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Backport loc fixes #44576
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, feature-templates

Updated

  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • Add IPNetwork.Parse and TryParse #44573
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Improve MapGroup link generation test #44562
  • Remove temporary allocations from Identity #44557
    Perf, area-identity
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add linux-musl-arm SOS support #1552
    7.0.0

Updated

  • Reenable TestDbgEng tests in M.D.DebugServices.UnitTests #3111

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Window.Height is -1 in Page_loaded() in Android Maui. #10747
  • ImageSource does not work with Uri's that have an & in the URI #10746
  • TabMaxWidth missing from TabLayout for Android #10745
  • Publishing iOS MAUI App in Devops #10742
  • Mysterious new NuGet source (/usr/local/share/dotnet/library-packs) #10740
  • Dynamic Resource TextColor of Label didn't update when the theme changes in Mac #10738
  • [iOS] Crash when debugging with Hot Reload on local iPhone device after the splash screen disappear #10737
  • MenuFlyoutItem command binding not working in submenu items #10734
    Backlog
  • No Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.GDI.Winforms NuGet Package #10733
  • How to display a Context Menu on a Mobile Device #10730
    Backlog
  • Detecting Light and Darkmode does not seem to be updated resuming the app. #10729
    Backlog
  • Text alignment not respected in migrated project #10728
    Backlog
  • Border Clipping Issue in [iOS & macOS] #10724
    Backlog
  • Android Emulator and accents #10723
    Backlog
  • Picker PlatformSpecific (UpdateMode) - Does not work #10722
    Backlog
  • Provide a way to do a best fit based on a list of map pins #10718
    Backlog

Closed

  • Issue with ListView and ObservableCollection #8734
  • iOS keyboard "done" button does not call Editor.Completed and does not close the keyboard. #10190
    Backlog
  • [Bug] Height and Width need to resize the EditText on SearchBar on Android #2956
    .NET 7 Planning
  • EAAccessoryManager required #10748
  • .NET 7: Maps control doesn't show zoom controls with constant IsZoomEnabled="true" #10394
    Backlog
  • MAUI App Windows App - Mouse movement reversed #10675
  • MauiWinUIWindow Bounds.Left and Bounds.Top are incorrect #10712
    Backlog
  • Validate Windows buttons have round corners #10644
    7.0
  • Preferences.Get() gives different results on Windows Machine simulator vs Android simulator ... #10676
  • Navigation bar vanishes when recreating Shell on Windows #6652
    Backlog
  • Shell.Current.Navigation.PushAsync Null Reference Exception #9647
    Backlog
  • Navigation not working on Windows #10241
    Backlog
  • System.NullReferenceException in ShellToolbarTracker.cs:58 #10442
    Backlog
  • Issue going back to the root page on Windows #10533
    Backlog
  • Compiler not recognising property on a model as a ListView #10732
  • [iOS16] Crash when tapped on text in Entry #10727
  • Pair to Mac failed with the error “The Xcode license status couldn't be verified because Xcode has not been found...” #10627
  • [MacCatalyst] Frame BackgroundColor is not working #10484
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] Frame is not clipping the Content #10483
    Backlog
  • Documentation for Geolocation returning null missing #10562
  • FlexLayout completely broken... #10717
  • Issue was closed without proper reading or understanding the issue #10720
  • System.UnathorizedException: denied access to resizer/r/drawable elements #10666
  • [Bug] Binding value to IsVisible of FlexLayout raises System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException on Windows #10198

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed the openiconic link #10749
    area/blazor 🕸️

Merged

  • [Blazor] Prevent locking on packaged app content #10744
  • [iOS] Set data context on MauiDoneAccessoryView. #10677
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure SearchView meets min size requirements #10510
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix Map not setting initial properties #10739
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [net6] Some fixes for tests #10695
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add Corner Radius Test for Windows Buttons #10743
  • Revert "[Windows] Fix default corner radius on Button" #10664
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10707
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add guidance how to test code documentation #10692
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Frame opacity #10672
    community ✨
  • Move init to mapper #10751
  • [Backport] [Blazor] Prevent locking on packaged app content (#10744) #10750
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 Planning
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Take with Range couldn't be translated to SQL query #29381
  • Columns with name "Id" in JSon object causes System.ArgumentException in materialization #29380
  • Incorrect Entries Values in DbUpdateException when an error occurs in the SQL MERGE statement during insert #29379
  • RelationalEntityTypeExtensions.GetSchemaQualifiedTableName() should ignore schemas when used with SQLite #29378
  • Occasional failure of ExecuteReader_retries_when_busy #29377
  • Bulk updates/deletes: Support in-memory provider #29376
  • Is the usage of enums as discriminators supported in TPH? #29373
  • LazyLoading not working #29372
  • Raw new DbContext will memory leak #29371

Closed

  • Database already exists error with localdb when Running uniitests #29354

PullRequests

Updated

  • SQLite: Use infix GLOB and REGEXP operators #23193
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29355 - FromSqlRaw throws Exception when querying all objects that contain a certain string property in a json array column #29366
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0
  • Update file "getting and building the code.md" #29361

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installer unable to build v7.0.100-rc.2.22477.23: missing NuGet packages #14784

PullRequests

Created
